text: Peter Kirk (1800 – 1 November 1856) was an Irish Conservative Party politician. Kirk was elected Conservative MP for at the 1835 general election and held the seat until 1847, when he stepped down. He was a member of the Carlton Club. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1800 births Category:1856 deaths Category:Irish Conservative Party MPs Category:UK MPs 1835–1837 Category:UK MPs 1837–1841 Category:UK MPs 1841–1847
title: Peter Kirk (MP for Carrickfergus)
